Name: Dopo Cena
Ingredients: 1 barspoon Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) 2 sugar to 1 water
1 dash Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Under the white head lies a dessert cocktail (Dopo Cena is Italian for 'after dinner') with aromatic cherry and marzipan flavours.
History: Created by Adrian Gomes, 10 Dollar Shake, Aberdeen, Scotland.
